newsitem.title: BULGARIA: WEATHER FORECAST - BULGARIA - JULY 29 - SUNNY, WARM.
newsitem.headline: WEATHER FORECAST - BULGARIA - JULY 29 - SUNNY, WARM.

text.p: Sunny with cloudy spells across the country, rain expected in the eastern regions, state radio said.
Maximum temperatures are expected between 26 and 31 degrees, temperature in Sofia is seen at about 26 degrees.
Air temperatures along the Black Sea coast are expected between 23 and 27 degrees. -- Sofia Newsroom, 359-2-91188
